title: Join the Food Standards Agency’s Scientific Advisory Committees

content.text: The Food Standards Agency is recruiting new members to join its independent Scientific Advisory Committees (SACs).
We are also recruiting associate members; an excellent opportunity for early and mid-career researchers.
Members provide independent expert assessment and advice on microbiological, chemical and other risks in food and feed, and in new food and feed products, additives, processes and packaging.
Your work will contribute directly to ensuring the safety of food, benefitting UK consumers and the effective, evidence-based regulation of food.
For more information visit Join our SACs and please share this opportunity in your networks.
